A powerful technique whereby Naruto, after accessing [[Son Gokū]]'s [[Lava Release|power]], creates a [[Rasenshuriken]] with a lava-infused nucleus, the heat of which causes the blades themselves to emit steam. The technique is strong enough to destroy a target's legs, and when expanded, it was powerful enough to bisect the [[Ten-Tails]]' tree form completely.
